name: Boot Slider
author: Dipto Paul

sections.description:
It a awosome slider plugin. That use bootstrap 4 origianl coursel feature and make awosome customize with functional.

Use Shortcode [boot_slider id=” “] or full [boot_slider id=” ” cat=” ” speed=”3000″ caption=”show/hide”]

Here

[boot_slider id=”any number/text” cat=”Boot Slider Category Slug Name” speed=”slider milli scound speed” caption=”Default it show, for hide write ‘hide’“]

Features

  • Bootstrap 5 Slider
  • Responsive Design
  • Any WordPress theme supported
  • Full Function on Dashboard
  • Easy to Use by Shortcode
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload boot-slider folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_shortcode('[boot_slider id=" " cat=" "]'); ?> in your templates
sections.faq:
Have any question about the slider?

Just contact me on email: bootstrapdiv@gmail.com

  • Fiest create bootstrap 4 version.
